content.rendered:
Directed by Rambala. Rambhala

Star Shiva (Chinnarasu). Nikki Galrani (Smitha). Akshara Gowda (Neelagandi). Urvashi (Parimalam). Anandraj (Rasu Gounder). Ravi Mariya. Redin Kingsley ((as Redin Kingselly)). R.N.R. Manohar. Mayilsamy. Crane Manohar. Bava Lakshmanan

Written by Rambala

Language Tamil

Producers Siddharth Ravipati

Production Screen Scene Media Entertainment
